# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

1. Remains of Frances Christian Ring being shipped from La Paz December 6 at 1910 hours via LAB Flight 861 to Miami for connection with Braniff Flight 140 due to arrive at Dallas, Texas 1430 hours on December 7, 1979. Request that you meet flight upon arrival at Dallas.

2. We wish to point out that preparation and shipment of remains is carried out in accordance with the laws of and facilities available in Bolivia and in most cases the services fall short of those expected in the United States. It is requested that your director determine the advisability of viewing the remains.

***
